metadata.description: Unified MLB predictions cache - standardized format

value_bets.rationale: Strong UNDER indication: Model predicts 7.7 runs vs 12.0 line (-4.3). 5000 simulations show 94.9% chance of staying under 12.0 runs.
Strong UNDER indication: Model predicts 6.5 runs vs 7.5 line (-1.0). Low variance simulation (tight scoring). 5000 simulations show 68.6% chance of staying under 7.5 runs.
Strong UNDER indication: Model predicts 7.7 runs vs 9.5 line (-1.8). Low variance simulation (tight scoring). 5000 simulations show 74.6% chance of staying under 9.5 runs.
Model shows Minnesota Twins with 63.7% win probability. Strong home advantage with 0.78 vs 1.14 scoring multipliers.
Strong OVER indication: Model predicts 8.8 runs vs 7.5 line (+1.3). Pitcher matchup: Tarik Skubal vs Bailey Ober. 5000 simulations show 65.2% chance of exceeding 7.5 runs.
Model shows Atlanta Braves with 66.1% win probability. Road team advantage with superior pitcher matchup or team strength.

Strong UNDER indication: Model predicts 6.5 runs vs 8.5 line (-2.0). Low variance simulation (tight scoring). Strong pitching matchup suppressing offense. 5000 simulations show 78.7% chance of staying under 8.5 runs.
Strong OVER indication: Pitcher matchup: Jesús Luzardo vs Brad Lord. 5000 simulations show 60.0% chance of exceeding 8.5 runs.
